programme.title: Arafat visits New York
programme.short_synopsis: Details of Yasser Arafat's speech at the 1995 meeting of the UN in New York City.
programme.medium_synopsis: The visit of Yasser Arafat to New York City to meet with the United Nations in 1995, the traffic carnage caused in the city and his plea to reconstitute the Security Council.
